about_the_game:
All Hail Gloop!

In All Hail Gloop, chaos reigns supreme as you take control of Gloop, a destructive force like no other! This top-down action-survival game challenges you to destroy everything in your path, collect gold and items, and use your spoils to become an unstoppable powerhouse.

Rampage across colorful hand-drawn landscapes, flattening houses, and gathering gold to upgrade your stats and abilities. The more you destroy, the stronger you become—but beware, enemies lurk around every corner! Can you outlast the hordes and grow your fortune, or will Gloop's destruction come to an end?

Key Features:

  • Destruction Frenzy: Tear down houses and collect gold as you pave your way through an endless world of chaos.

  • Endless Upgrades: Use gold to upgrade Gloop’s health, damage, and speed, and unlock powerful passives like Buzzing Good Time, Rocket Man, and In Gloop! We Grow—each boosting your destructive capabilities.

  • Survival Mode: Survive as long as possible while collecting as much gold as you can to increase your power.

  • Unique Art Style: Immerse yourself in a vibrant, hand-drawn world, where every item is ripe for destruction.

  • Strategic Builds: Save your build, experiment with different passive skills, and become the ultimate Gloop of destruction.

It’s time to take over the world, one house at a time. All Hail Gloop will test your reflexes, strategy, and hunger for chaos in this fun and frenetic destruction-fest!
